snippet: A proposal has circulated among major publishers for a book written by the former president.
abstract: Former Pres Jimmy Carter is planning to write as-yet-untitled book about unequal treatment of women around the world.
lead_paragraph: A proposal has circulated among major publishers for a book written by the former president.

headline.main: Jimmy Carter Seeks to Write Book on Treatment of Women
headline.print_headline:
Jimmy Carter Plans
Book on Women
